page.title: 05S'gate-Transport/Lifestyles
page.content: In the morning {Southgate}is a busy place with commuters coming to the Underground Station to catch trains or buses to take them to work. Other people travel by car motor-bike or bicycle and{Southgate}can become conjested causing traffic jams. There are many schools around { {Southgate}and in the morning the school children, wearing school uniform and carrying bags with their books, sports kit and perhaps musical instruments, are off to school. Also delivery vans can be seen taking supplies to the shops. Often security guards are seen taking money to banks or people queueing at the cash dispensers outside. After the early morning rush, {Southgate}quietens down, with housewives and senior citizens doing their shopping. There is less traffic about for a while.
